modShortDescription: These mods add some extra HUD bars and info to the UI as well as rework the toolbelt and make a few other changes. Works with Alpha 17.4 and Alpha 18.
modDescription:
These mods are stedman420’s humble attempt at yet another UI mod. These mods will work with Alpha 17.4 and most work with Alpha 18 as well. These mods add some extra [HUD](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-hud-mod/) bars and info to the UI as well as rework the [toolbelt](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-toolbelt/) and make a few other changes.

## Simple UI 4 Digit Craft

Makes it so you can enter a 4 digit number when crafting. A17 only. This is no longer needed in A18.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1S1Yxk-chlSimeGArEHe2XlC45d9sy-qF&export=download) Simple UI 4 Digit Craft for Alpha 17

## Simple UI Bigger Backpack 60 Slots

Increases backpack size to 60 slots.  
\*Not compatible with Simple UI Bigger [Backpack](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-backpack/) 120 Slots.  
\*Not compatible with Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots + Player Built Storage.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1L9s2tu291E_KhCNWwTVmk4ZNvs5rOdu9&export=download) Simple UI Bigger Backpack 60 Slots v1.1 for Alpha 17  
[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1HUrsuZ4suZkawJiCnT3d0SV7KSHbTlAI&export=download) Simple UI Bigger Backpack 60 Slots v1.2 for Alpha 18

## Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots

Increases backpack size to 120 [slots](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/).  
\*Not compatible with Simple UI Bigger Backpack 60 Slots.  
\*Not compatible with Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots + Player Built Storage.  
\*Not compatible with Simple UI Player Built Storage.  
\*Requires a 16:9 resolution or better.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1rVAKMsts_0w-rfbs9g8dN4-21bDvpk2S&export=download) Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots v1.1 for Alpha 17  
[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1JvTjmz6igpOuJ7cj42r_eLS2RWFo_fVA&export=download) Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots v1.2 for Alpha 18

## Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots + Player Built Storage

Increases backpack size to 120 slots. Increases player built storage to 143 slots.  
\*Not compatible with Simple UI Bigger Backpack 60 Slots.  
\*Not compatible with Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots.  
\*Not compatible with Simple UI Player Built Storage.  
\*Requires a 16:9 resolution or better.  
\*Requires a new save to avoid errors with old containers.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1uqPvLENQ7hFIxWPtCNQNV3fDzTm5KyB_&export=download) Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots + Player Built Storage v1.1 for Alpha 17  
[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1so5XF8vrIUSLCPJcSkTOM11azyKFtYnH&export=download) Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots + Player Built Storage v1.2 for Alpha 18

## Simple UI Compass

Two indicators were added to the top and bottom of the compass to show which way you’re facing. Outside temp, and Elevation added to the right of day and time under the compass.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1Eq8ekUOVtDJVSKKlNNgQ4XEqSJsf6W-E&export=download) Simple UI Compass v1.1

## Simple UI Crafting Queue

Increases crafting queue from 4 spaces to 5 spaces.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=18j_4kqaLN8AJn4az10Az1WqLhNLDfEfD&export=download) Simple UI Crafting Queue

## Simple UI Forge Input

Increases forge input from 2 spaces to 3 spaces.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1iN3ryIo1xpbzEjjidYU0JkaKn0YgwJE2&export=download) Simple UI Forge Input

## Simple UI Left HUD

\*Food and Water bars added to the bottom left HUD. (below health)  
\*Feels like temp added to the bottom left HUD. (above stamina)  
Has a toggle to the right of the water bar to toggle the food and water display. Not compatible with any other left hud mod.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1VvYueOMFHSrF4vpCgjsRc1mRtA3UfWuR&export=download) Simple UI Left HUD v1.6

## Simple UI Left HUD Buff Timers

\*Food and Water bars added to the bottom left HUD. (below health)  
\*Feels like temp added to the bottom left HUD. (above stamina)  
\*Buffs with timers added.  
 Has a toggle to the right of the water bar to toggle the food and water display. Not compatible with any other Left HUD mod.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1a0vaQjqtun0c8SttgOOnPag8EHlUWOtk&export=download) Simple UI Left HUD Buff Timers v1.6

## Simple UI Left HUD No Temp

\*Food and Water bars added to the bottom left HUD. (below health)  
Has a toggle to the right of the water bar to toggle the food and water display. Not compatible with any other Left HUD mod.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1hCgAZgBu7ifAaIsepQvvtG5rU1ocrqF3&export=download) Simple UI Left HUD No Temp v1.6

## Simple UI Left HUD No Temp Buff Timers

\*Food and Water bars added to the bottom left HUD. (below health)  
\*Buffs with timers added.  
Has a toggle to the right of the water bar to toggle the food and water display. Not compatible with any other Left HUD mod.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1p--_C9hWDRN4oLkJ7JIrU-8qmpGIA9tI&export=download) Simple UI Left HUD No Temp Buff Timers v1.6

## Simple UI Player Built Storage

Increases player built storage to 140 slots.  
\*Not compatible with Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots.  
\*Not compatible with Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots + Player Built Storage.  
\*Requires a 16:9 resolution or better.  
\*Requires a new save to avoid errors with old containers.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=148mYma0ZaQwsZyaKlNDwBRWTaFvBdbs1&export=download) Simple UI Player Built Storage

## Simple UI Toolbelt

Enlarged toolbelt slots.  
\*Toolbelt slots now have key numbers in top left corner.  
\*Toolbelt holding color is now green.  
\*Player level with icon added to the top left of the toolbelt.  
\*Player deaths with icon added to the bottom left of the toolbelt.  
\*Zombie kill counter with icon added to the top right of the toolbelt.  
\*PVP kill counter with icon added to the bottom right of the toolbelt.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1E3XNaLeel9GXtcOk2ddMjh3Nok-N_Aft&export=download) Simple UI Toolbelt for Alpha 17  
[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1Sgk4sffbz1jV399dkyPj1olTuIu1v395&export=download) Simple UI Toolbelt v1.2 for Alpha 18

## Simple UI Vehicle Storage

Increases all vehicle’s storage to 90 slots  
\*Requires a 16:9, 16:10, or better resolution (unless used with Simple UI Bigger Backpack 60 Slots)  
You will not see the increased vehicle storage size until picking up your vehicle and placing it back down.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1xqi-tjfiAhnrn9JYICc_fz38gmmjiwSb&export=download) Simple UI Vehicle Storage

**How to Install:** Download the zip files of your choice and extract the Mods folder to your 7 Days To Die installation directory “\\steamapps\\common\\7 Days To Die”

**Important Note:** May not be compatible with other UI mods.

If you want to download all mods: [Download](https://github.com/stedman420/Simple_UI_Modlets/archive/master.zip) All Simple UI Mods

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/7903-a17-simple-ui-modlets/).

**Credits:** stedman420  
**Additional Credits/Thanks:** Russiandood, Dust2Death, Red Eagle LXIX

Simple UI 4 Digit Craft
Makes it so you can enter a 4 digit number when crafting. A17 only. This is no longer needed in A18.

*Not compatible with Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots.

*Not compatible with Simple UI Bigger Backpack 120 Slots + Player Built Storage.
